Description: Commerce marketing automation provider, enabling retailers to drive revenue through their email, mobile and social campaigns.
Name: Bronto

Methods.Name: Get Contacts
Methods.Description: Return contacts that match the given filter.

Methods.Name: Add or Update Contacts
Methods.Description: Add a new contact, or update an existing contact. You can also add or update data associated with the contact, such as field data and list membership.

Methods.Name: Add or Update Contacts Incremental
Methods.Description: Add a new contact or update data associated with an existing contact without replacing the existing contact’s list membership. Custom field locations should be as follows: SOAP-ENV:Envelope.customFields.yourfieldnamehere

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Update Contacts allows you to update contact(s) and associated data.

Methods.Name: Get Lists
Methods.Description: Return lists that match the given filter.

Methods.Name: Add Contacts to List
Methods.Description: This function allows you to add one or more contacts to a list. You are limited to adding 5k contacts per call.
